qiskit_aqua.algorithms.single_sample.iqpe.iqpe module¶

The Iterative Quantum Phase Estimation Algorithm. See https://arxiv.org/abs/quant-ph/0610214

class qiskit_aqua.algorithms.single_sample.iqpe.iqpe.IQPE(operator, state_in, num_time_slices=1, num_iterations=1, paulis_grouping='default', expansion_mode='suzuki', expansion_order=2, shallow_circuit_concat=False)[source]¶

Bases: qiskit_aqua.algorithms.quantum_algorithm.QuantumAlgorithm

The Iterative Quantum Phase Estimation algorithm. See https://arxiv.org/abs/quant-ph/0610214
